message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with visual recognition and natural language processing, which are both sub-fields of computer vision and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel approach to training neural language models, which falls under the sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language). The use of deep learning models for representation learning suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.LG (Machine Learning), while the focus on zero-shot learning and classification makes cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a likely sub-category as well. Finally, the paper's use of text-based image retrieval suggests that it could also be classified under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
